column2: the more "traditional" Japanese items -- basically everything else we ordered -- were good
column3: but nothing to write home about. I was a bit disappointed by the rolls
column4: even though they are simple HH rolls
column5: but I was expecting more flavor and care in them. The toro did not compare to toro I've had at other (out-of-state) places
column7: fatty tuna should be delicious every single time. The uni didn't taste very fresh
column8: and I have to say MF Sushi's salmon sashimi kicks Kata Robata's butt. But again
column9: I'd chalk it up to an off day for the daily catch.
